feed.title: SimpleX Chat Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for SimpleX Chat: v6.0.1
entry.content:
New in v6.0.1: UI fixes.

v6 release announcement: https://simplex.chat/blog/20240814-simplex-chat-vision-funding-v6-private-routing-new-user-experience.html

Commits: - flatpak: update metainfo (#4660) - cli: do not log events for hidden user profiles (#4658) - ios: mark chat non deleted only on send/receive (keep chatDeleted flag on open) (#4659) - multiplatform: mark chat non deleted only on send/receive (keep chatDeleted flag on open) (#4664) - ios: fix updating chat wallpaper while app is in background (#4661) - android: fix group creation chat redirection showing attachments view (#4669) - ui: disable subs indicator when chat is stopped (#4672) - ui: improve remote controller stop reason (#4670) - android: replacing a crash with an alert when opening broken Uri (#4674) - android, desktop: fix crash on marking chat read (#4671) - android, desktop: padding for RTL layout and remembering prefered layout (#4675) - android, desktop: fix chatView state propagation (#4676) - android, desktop: searching in different screens using the same data (#4673) - ios: optimise chat switching (#4663) - ios: speed up network status handling (#4678) - ios: fix merged item order (#4682) - blog: v6 announcement (#4598) - android: hide keyboard when not needed (#4689) - android, desktop: fix loading more items when fast switching chats (#4685) - ios: add text to share extension link preview (#4683) - ios: fix messages reseting position, when app is brought from background to foreground (#4686) - core: 6.0.1.0 - website: translation (#4692) - ui: translations (#4654) - 6.0.1: ios 233, android 232, desktop 62

Android APKs:

SHA2-512(simplex.apk)= ce73cebb35313600e4ecf532eb5b1339a45675473a32c39c833628007ea888616fba963e65ce69c27167ae9ea9e2c1feabe55008cfb372e17e9f9a3c5e1cfb45

entry.title: New release for SimpleX Chat: v6.0.2
entry.content:
New in 6.0.2 - reduce memory usage and app start time. - faster sending files to groups. - UI: fixes and improvements.

v6 release announcement: https://simplex.chat/blog/20240814-simplex-chat-vision-funding-v6-private-routing-new-user-experience.html

Commits: - core: batch send file descriptions (#4684) - ios: fix pending connection sheet styling when opened via icon; fix tappable area of pending connections and contact requests (#4694) - upgrade code scanner (#4650) - extend chat view material behind keyboard (#4698) - remove text slection context menu from chat item (#4699) - core: batch connection subscription transactions (#4701) - ios: asychronous subscription updates (#4707) - ios: filter agent subscriptions from chat console (#4708) - core: only start message delivery workers when there are pending messages (#4713) - android, desktop: scrolling moves title to app bar (#4703) - ios: optimize performance of updating chats (#4723) - ios: asynchronous api calls when entering foreground (#4710) - ios: fix visual artifacts when opening a chat on iOS15 (#4726) - ios: fix interface color without callKit (#4727) - Revert "ios: asynchronous api calls when entering foreground (#4710)" - core: api to change user of pending connections (#4681) - ios: fix notifying the recipient when hanging up a call in ios15 (#4731) - android, desktop: layout changes for settings items (#4732) - ios: fix last message being hidden on load (#4733) - ios: prevent hangs when opening app from background with async api calls (#4730) - core: 6.0.2.0 (simplexmq 6.0.1.0) - android, desktop: fix onboarding layout (#4734) - android, desktop: fix applying theme when no global theme edited yet (#4735) - ios: update library - ios: fix applying theme when no global theme edited yet (#4738) - ui: translations (#4740) - 6.0.2: ios 234, android 234, desktop 63

Android APKs:

SHA2-512(simplex.apk)= 23e43c104ef24c43ba9a3c12bd5251d105f6a8165f3eb08e4039d5fe7d1d1edf53cc7391ee6c2a166ecb8a871940203114de04b2c4fbbdcccc496c666b141514

entry.title: New release for SimpleX Chat: v6.0.3
entry.content:
New in v6.0.3: - fix rare delivery bug.

v6 release announcement: https://simplex.chat/blog/20240814-simplex-chat-vision-funding-v6-private-routing-new-user-experience.html

entry.title: New release for SimpleX Chat: v6.0.4
entry.content:
New in v6.0.4: - reduced traffic and battery usage on unstable networks. - desktop: only offer the next versions for update, based on SerVer ordering. - UI fixes.

Commits: - ui: fix Debug delivery (#4757) - ios: remove unnecessary protocols (#4763) - android, desktop: items padding and min height (#4767) - android, desktop: using SemVer when checking for updates (#4768) - desktop: show only AppImage download option for those who running AppImage (#4774) - flatpak: update metainfo (#4784) - core: call uuid (#4777) - ios: make CallKit calls fire in time after cold start (#4787) - fix android simulator build (#4795) - android, desktop: improvement to a lock UI (#4769) - android, desktop: fix loading chat items when search was not empty (#4802) - core: 6.0.4.0 (simplexmq 6.0.3.0) - ios: update core library - android, desktop: small enhancements to new chat sheet (#4803) - 6.0.4: ios 236, android 237, desktop 65

Android APKs:

SHA2-512(simplex.apk)= b9c4f321fe38bea45998c458b5a9d095471a493d951e2d1bca3f54aa2974d4618dea738ea12c8757fdda5a6fa1b34bb12ef3c9febe9b3830039566f7ec661d59

entry.title: New release for SimpleX Chat: v6.0.5
entry.content:
New in v6.0.5: - support generic SOCKS proxies. - fix calls stuck in "connecting..." state. - update to Android API 34. - fixes.

Please note: v6.0.5 is older than previously released v6.1.0-beta.1. Only install it if you have v6.0.4.

Commits: - docs: FAQ on deletion of sent messages and read receipts (#4470) - faq: private message routing (#4807) - desktop: fix vlc dependency (#4809) - flatpak: update metainfo (#4811) - android, desktop: group info remembers scroll position and search (#4817) - android, desktop: remove slash from strings (#4818) - android, desktop: fix crash when window is small in chat view (#4819) - android, desktop: making list items unique (#4812) - multiplatform: fix deleted contacts with conversations being identified as contact cards (#4828) - android: fix initializing WorkManager (#4833) - blog: fix grammar error (#4846) - core: allow deleting user when user record in agent database was deleted (#4851) - fix incorrect error of migration to device (#4852) - multiplatform: fix delete messages alert (#4862) - android: remove Worker provider's interface implementation (#4874) - core: support different SOCKS proxy authentication modes (#4886) - core: reduce max message sizes (#4882) - android, desktop: fix always connecting state in call (#4911) - android: target API level 34 (Android 14) (#4697) - ci: dont build when files in core do not change (#4797) - core: 6.0.5.0 (simplexmq 6.0.5.0) - desktop: fix vlc dependency (2) (#4869) - ios: SOCKS proxy UI (#4893) - android, desktop: proxy configuration includes credentials (#4892) - ios: update core library - 6.0.5: ios 239, android 241, desktop 68

Android APKs:

SHA2-512(simplex.apk)= 350d3a1b9ee52c1d74b9ede3a9efd0f9e9002f6c2f03540c456cfc8ba439a76b04995a97867294494afc4aec9a4a86182a84e87b0a51a68acc6d32986a1f5352
